d2_dictionary.title: Contains the queries for the Issued Print Site Notifier based Jobs.
d2_dictionary.application_names: OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution

alias.name: Query
alias.value: select object_name, requestor, print_site, print_location, page_range, date_printed, reconciliation_due_date from cd_issued_print where reconciliation_due_date <= DATEADD(day, 7, DATE(TODAY)) and reconciliation_due_date >= DATE(TODAY) and print_site = '%s' and a_status='Printed'

alias.name: Query
alias.value: select object_name, requestor, print_site, print_location, page_range, date_printed, reconciliation_due_date from cd_issued_print where reconciliation_due_date is not nulldate and reconciliation_due_date <= DATE(TODAY) and print_site = '%s' and a_status='Printed'

alias.name: Query
alias.value: select object_name, requestor, r_creation_date as date_requested, print_site, print_location, approval_due_date from cd_issued_print_request where approval_due_date is not nulldate and approval_due_date <= DATE(TODAY) and print_site = '%s' and a_status='Pending Approval'
